name: Tab Age Tracker
description: Track and manage your browser tabs by age
changelog: Fixed search functionality in popup.js to properly redirect to the dashboard with search parameters
Fixed chart visibility issue in Chrome extension by preloading Chart.js in the head of popup.html
Fixed 'View Details in Web Dashboard' button to ensure proper URL construction
Improved error handling for service worker issues in background.js
Added detailed logging to track URL navigation for easier debugging

issues_fixed.description: Search functionality not working in Chrome extension
Charts not visible in Chrome extension
Service worker errors displayed in console

author: Tab Zero Team
